name: Bee Prepared
description:
Bee Prepared - A really small game, where you control a bee which has to collect polls, to survive the next winter.
It was created during the #3 Gameleon Gamejam in Hamburg. The theme was "Making a positive impact on the real world", so our game includes a meta-message -> You can't beat the third level, because there is too much human civilisation. Think about that and try to be a better person :P Be nice to bees! Give them a hug once in a while.
